entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PrivateAssets=all has different behavior than PrivateAssets=compile;build;buildTransitive.... #39465

Closed

  • You must install .NET to run this application / .NET location: Not found #39259
  • Where is .NET SDK 5.0.416? The latest download is 5.0.408. #39409

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #39453
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #39448
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #39447
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #39426
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    untriaged, Area-CLI

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Don't use the xunit return code when running in helix only #39271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Watch UI #39410
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Respect the profile attribute on runtime packs #39402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads
  • Enable publishing in VMR #39311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Fingerprint and Hash for SWA. #39405
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • No drive enumerations Fixes #38050 #38436
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
